name: Ridiculous Fishing
summary: Ridiculous Fishing is a mobile fishing video game where players use motion and touch controls to catch fish and subsequently shoot them out of the sky for cash.
info:
• 开发: Vlambeer
  • 发行: Vlambeer
  • 平台: Android
  • 平台: iOS
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2013年3月14日
  • 官方网站: http://www.ridiculousfishing.com/
